metadata.title: CVE-2022-23959 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Varnish Cache before 6.6.2 and 7.x before 7.0.2, Varnish Cache 6.0 LTSbefore 6.0.10, and and Varnish Enterprise (Cache Plus) 4.1.x before4.1.11r6 and 6.0.x before 6.0.9r4, request smuggling can occur for HTTP/1connections.

criterions.comment: varnish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
